  • Constructor Details

    • Hand

      public Hand(Deck deck) throws NullPointerException, OutOfCardsException
      Public Constructor of a hand from a Deck
      Parameters:
      deck - to draw cards from
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - when deck is null
      OutOfCardsException - if the deck is out of cards

    • Hand

      public Hand(String string) throws NullPointerException
      Public Constructor of a hand from a String
      Parameters:
      string - represents the hand should be in the form of Value then Suit for each card
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - when string is null

      newCard - the card to be replaced with
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - when index is not valid
      NullPointerException - when newCard is null
